location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Jabal NAKHSH taken from North from 1/4 mile distance on Mica hill'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 67 x 110 mm.Foliation: the main folio number, 135, appears on a separate insert in the top right corner of the polyester sleeve in which the photograph is housed. An additional folio number, which is not circled, appears in the same position.

mods.abstract: Photograph of Jabal Nakhsh in Qatar. The title is inscribed on the verso of the item. The photograph was sent by Ernest Vincent Packer, Manager, Petroleum Concessions Limited, Bahrain to Lieutenant-Colonel Percy Gordon Loch, Political Resident, Bahrain. Packer's covering letter, dated 17 March 1937 is on folio 133 of IOR/R/15/2/160.
